text: Togohaa dangada di langi ga ili dana buu ‘trumpet’. Gei dahi baahi e dolu o di laa, dahi baahi e dolu o di malama, dahi baahi e dolu o nia heduu la gu dugidugi gu momooho, ga hidi mai ai dahi baahi e dolu o nadau maahina la gu bouli. Dahi baahi e dolu o di aa mo dahi baahi e dolu o di boo la gu deai nau maahina ai.8.12 Isaiah 13.10; Ezekiel 32.7; Joel 2.10,31; 3.15
